rdul snyed du 'bul bar phul ba bas ni/ byang chub sems dpa' gzhan gang zhig gi chos kyi rnam grangs 'di las tha na tshig bzhi pa'i tshigs su bcad pa
gcig tsam zhig byang chub sems dpa' gzhan la bstan par gyur na/ bsod nams mngon par 'du ba de la bsod nams mngon par 'du bya ba snga ma des ni/
brgya'i char yang nye bar mi 'gro'o/ /stong gi cha dang / 'bum gyi cha dang / bye ba phrag 'bum gyi cha dang / grangs dang / cha dang / bgrang ba dang / dpe dang / rgyur yang
nye bar mi 'gro'o/ /'jam dpal/ bskal pa stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed du sbyin pa'i bsod nams mngon par 'du
bya ba lta zhog gi /'jam dpal/ gal te byang chub sems dpa' gang+gA'i bye ma ltar grangs med pa snyed cig byung bar gyur la/ de dag las byang chub sems dpa'
re res kyang sangs rgyas kyi zhing dzam+bu chu bo'i gser las byas pa/ shing ljon pa thams cad kyang lha'i gos rnams kyis yongs su dkris pa/ nor bu rin po che 'od thams
cad yang dag par 'dus pa'i dra bas kun nas g.yogs pa/ nor bu rin po che dbang gi rgyal po las byas pa'i khang pa brtsegs pa/ nor bu rin po che glog gi sgron ma'i
lan kan gyis yongs su bskor ba dag gis yongs su gang bar byas pa/ gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan bsgreng ba/ gang+gA'i bye ma ltar grangs med pa ji snyed cig
sangs rgyas gang+gA'i bye ma ltar grangs med pa snyed dag la nyin gcig bzhin du dbul bar 'bul zhing / de ltar phul bas bskal pa gang+gA'i bye ma ltar grangs med pa
snyed du 'bul bar phul ba bas ni/ byang chub sems dpa' gzhan gang zhig gis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la mos par byas nas chos kyi rnam
grangs 'di las tha na tshig bzhi pa'i tshigs su bcad pa gcig tsam zhig byang chub sems dpa' gzhan la bstan tam/ 'jug par byas na/ bsod nams mngon
par 'du bya ba de la byang chub sems dpa' de dag gi sbyin pa las byung ba'i bsod nams mngon par 'du bya ba snga ma des ni/ brgya'i char yang nye bar mi 'gro'o/ /stong
gi cha dang / 'bum gyi cha dang / bye ba phrag 'bum gyi cha dang / grangs dang / cha dang / bgrang ba dang / dpe dang / rgyur yang nye bar mi 'gro'o/ /'jam dpal/
'di lta ste/ dper na/ khams gsum du gtogs pa'i sems can thams cad sems can dmyal ba dang / dud 'gro dang / yi dwags dang / gshin rje'i
'jig rten du skyes par gyur la/ de nas byang chub sems dpa'i khyim pa zhig gis sems can de dag thams cad sems can dmyal ba dang / dud 'gro dang /
yi dwags dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten nas bton te rang sangs rgyas nyid la bkod pa bas ni/ byang chub sems dpa' rab tu byung ba gzhan gang zhig gis tha
na dud 'gro'i skye gnas su skyes pa'i sems can la sbyin pa kham gcig tsam zhig byin par gyur na/ de ni/ de bas ches bsod nams mang ba dang / ches bsod nams
grangs med pa bskyed par 'gyur ro/ /'jam dpal/ gal te byang chub sems dpa' rab tu byung ba sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed cig byung bar
gyur la| de dag las byang chub sems dpa' re res kyang phyogs bcu'i phyogs cha re rer sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa bye ba khrag khrig
'bum phrag bcu'i rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed dag mthong bar gyur cing / de bzhin gshegs pa byang chub sems dpa' dang bcas/ nyan thos dang bcas pa re re la'ang
bskal pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag bcu'i rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed du na bza' dang / zhal zas dang / gzims cha dang / gdan
dang / snyun gyi gsos sman dang / yo byad rnams kyis kyang bsnyen bkur byed la/ de bzhin gshegs pa re re la'ang nyin gcig bzhin du 'jig rten gyi khams sangs
rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag bcu'i rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed dag nor bu rin po che dbang gi rgyal pos yongs su bkang ste dbul bar phul ba bas
na| byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la mos par gyur pa gzhan zhig gis tha na dud 'gro'i skye gnas su skyes pa'i
sems can la sbyin pa kham gcig tsam zhig byin par gyur na/ bsod nams mngon par 'du bya ba de la byang chub sems dpa' de dag gi sbyin pa las byung
ba'i bsod nams mngon par 'du bya ba snga ma des ni/ brgya'i char yang nye bar mi 'gro'o/ /stong gi cha dang / 'bum gyi cha dang / bye ba phrag 'bum gyi cha
dang / grangs dang / cha dang / bgrang ba dang / dpe dang / rgyur yang nye bar mi 'gro'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'jam dpal/ 'di lta ste/ chos kyi rnam
grangs 'di thos pa ni/ byang chub sems dpa' phyir mi ldog pa rnams kyi phyag rgya yin pa'i phyir ro/ /'jam dpal/ gal te byang chub sems dpa' la
la zhig gis phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can thams cad dad pa'i rjes su 'brang ba nyid la bkod pa bas ni/ byang chub sems dpa'
gzhan gang zhig gis sems can gcig cig don gyi rjes su 'brang ba nyid la bkod par gyur na/ de ni/ de bas ches bsod nams grangs med pa bskyed par
'gyur ro/ /'jam dpal/ gal te byang chub sems dpa' la la zhig gis phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can thams cad don gyi rjes su 'brang
ba nyid la bkod pa bas ni/ byang chub sems dpa' gzhan gang zhig gis sems can gcig cig chos kyi rjes su 'brang ba nyid la bkod par gyur na/ de ni/ de
bas ches bsod nams grangs med pa bskyed par 'gyur ro/ /'jam dpal/ gal te byang chub sems dpa' la la zhig gis phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams
kyi sems can thams cad chos kyi rjes su 'brang ba nyid la bkod pa bas ni/ byang chub sems dpa' gzhan gang zhig gis sems can gcig cig rgyun du zhugs
pa'i 'bras bu la bkod par gyur na/ de ni/ de bas ches bsod nams grangs med pa bskyed par 'gyur ro/ /'jam dpal/ gal te byang chub sems dpa' la
la zhig gis phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can thams cad rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la bkod pa bas ni/ byang chub sems dpa' gzhan gang
zhig gis sems can gcig cig lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la bkod par gyur pa de ni/ de bas ches bsod nams grangs med pa bskyed par 'gyur ro/ /
'jam dpal/ gal te byang chub sems dpa' la la zhig gis phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can thams cad lan
gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la bkod pa bas ni/ byang chub sems dpa' gzhan gang zhig gis sems can gcig cig phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la bkod par
gyur na| de ni/ de bas ches bsod nams grangs med pa bskyed par 'gyur ro/ /'jam dpal/ gal te byang chub sems dpa' la la zhig gis phyogs
bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can thams cad phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la bkod pa bas ni/ byang chub sems dpa' gzhan gang zhig gis sems
can gcig cig dgra bcom pa nyid la bkod par gyur na/ de ni/ de bas ches bsod nams grangs med pa bskyed par 'gyur ro/ /'jam dpal/ gal te
byang chub sems dpa' la la zhig gis phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can thams cad dgra bcom pa nyid la bkod pa bas ni/ byang chub sems
dpa' gzhan gang zhig gis sems can gcig cig rang sangs rgyas nyid la bkod par gyur na/ de ni/ de bas ches bsod nams grangs med pa bskyed par 'gyur
ro| |'jam dpal/ gal te byang chub sems dpa' gang la la zhig gis phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can thams cad rang sangs rgyas nyid la bkod pa
bas ni| byang chub sems dpa' gzhan gang zhig gis sems can gcig cig byang chub kyi sems la bkod par gyur na/ de ni/ de bas ches bsod nams grangs
med pa bskyed par 'gyur ro/ /'jam dpal/ gal te byang chub sems dpa' la la zhig gis phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can thams cad byang
chub kyi sems la bkod pa bas ni/ byang chub sems dpa' gzhan gang zhig gis sems can gcig cig phyir mi ldog pa nyid la bkod par gyur na/ de ni/ de
bas ches bsod nams grangs med pa bskyed par 'gyur ro/ /'jam dpal/ gal te byang chub sems dpa' la la zhig gis phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams
kyi sems can thams cad phyir mi ldog pa nyid la bkod pa bas ni/ byang chub sems dpa' gzhan gang zhig gis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la mos shing yi ger 'brir
bcug nas gzhan dag la rgya cher yang dag par ston pa dang / tha na sems can gcig cig chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la 'jug par byas na/ de ni/ de bas ches
bsod nams grangs med pa bskyed par 'gyur ro/ /de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsal
to| |byang chub sems dpa' gang zhig zad pa'i dus mtha'i tshe/ /sangs rgyas bye ba phrag bcu'i dam chos 'dzin pa bas/ /gang zhig mdo sde 'di ni nyan par byed gyur
na| |de ni de bas bsod nams chen po khyad par 'phags/ /gang zhig rdzu 'phrul stobs kyis phyogs bcur song nas ni/ /sangs rgyas bye ba phrag bcu dag la mchod
byed cing / /snying rje bskyed de bde ba kun la chags med par/ /skyes bu dam pa thams cad phyag 'tshal btsud pa bas/ /gang zhig bder gshegs bstan la sems
rab dad gyur cing / /rgyal ba'i chos rnams smon par byed pa'i mdo sde 'di/ /gzhan la yud tsam gcig cig ston par byed gyur na/ /de ni de bas bsod nams
'bras bu khyad par 'phags/ /bde gshegs bstan pa'i mdo sde sgron mar gyur pa 'di/ /gang gis lha dang mi la yang dag bstan/ /byas pa de ni shes rab rno zhing
mthu chen ldan gyur la/ /sangs rgyas rnams kyis yang myur du 'thob par 'gyur/ /gang gis bde gshegs sangs rgyas mi mchog de dag ni/ /phung po lhag ma med
par yongs su mya ngan las/ /'das par gyur ba dag gi de 'dra'i sgra thos nas/ /sems can gzhan la'ang yang dag sgrog par byed gyur cing / /mchod rten gnam 'phang mtho
ba srid rtse'i mthar thug pa/ /khyon dang ldan par gyur pa'ang srid rtse ji bzhin pa/ /rin chen mdzes pas spras shing gdugs dang ba dan dang / /de bzhin dril sgras mdzes par byed
du gcig gyur pas/ /'di na byang chub sems dpa' gang zhig 'di 'dra ba'i/ /mdo sde 'di thos lus la gnas par 'gyur ba'am/ /glegs bam bri ba byas te gzhag par
byed 'dod na/ /de ni de yi bsod nams 'bras bu khyad par 'phags/ /ser sna'i dri ma bsal bar gyur cing 'jigs med pa'i/ /byang chub sems dpa' gang zhig chos 'di
'dzin byed na/ /de yi bsod nams dpag tu yod par mi 'gyur te/ /ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin du byang chub thob par 'gyur/ /mdo 'di bde bar gshegs pa rnams kyis rab
bsngags shing / /byang chub sems dpa' mang pos yongs su bzung ba yin/ /de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi sku lus nam mkha' yi/ /khams dang 'dra ba thams cad 'dir ni
bstan pa yin/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa dang / byang chub sems
dpa' dang / nyan thos chen po grangs med pa bsam gyis mi khyab brjod du med pa dag dang / lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin dang / nam
mkha' lding dang / dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rang ste bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do/ /'phags pa sangs rgyas thams cad kyi
yul la 'jug pa ye shes snang ba'i rgyan ces bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po su ren+d+ra bo d+hi dang / zhu chen gyi lo tsA
ba ban+d+he ye shes sde la sogs pas bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa/ zhus dag/ //
